description: This file defines the AppTheme class, which encapsulates the color scheme and theme styling for a Flutter mobile application. It provides a beach-inspired color palette and a light theme configuration for use throughout the app.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A class providing static theme data and color scheme for the Flutter app, including beach-inspired colors and theme styling.

methods.name: AppTheme.lightTheme
methods.description: A getter that returns a ThemeData object configured with a light color scheme, custom app bar, card, input decoration, elevated button, and text button styles.
